title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Dive into Poolside: AI Models for Highly Secure Software Environments (AIM261)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入了解 Poolside：高度安全软件环境的 AI 模型 (AIM261)
abstract: Join poolside and Northrop Grumman Space Systems to explore how poolside’s foundational AI models accelerate enterprise software development efforts—working securely within regulated environments. This session covers poolside's platform architecture and security model, followed by demos of key use cases such as reviewing code, generating tests, and integrating with CI/CD pipelines. Hear directly from Northrop Grumman Space Systems on their perspective in deploying poolside’s foundational AI models for secure, high-velocity software development. Learn how this collaboration improves code quality, productivity, and iteration speed. This presentation is brought to you by poolside, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 加入poolside和诺斯罗普·格鲁曼空间系统公司，探索poolside的基础AI模型如何加速企业软件开发工作——在受监管环境中安全运行。本次会议涵盖poolside的平台架构和安全模型，随后演示关键用例，如代码审查、测试生成以及与CI/CD管道集成。直接听取诺斯罗普·格鲁曼空间系统公司关于部署poolside基础AI模型进行安全、高速软件开发的观点。了解这种合作如何提高代码质量、生产力和迭代速度。本演示由AWS合作伙伴poolside提供。
